title: Medieval Fantasy Armor SFX: Pick Up, Equip, and Other Inventory Sounds
description: Our Medieval Fantasy Armor SFX pack offers 103 carefully chosen armor and and shield sound effects. It includes sounds suitable for pick-up or equip, crafting, repair, magical enhance, and dismantle actions for immersive gameplay.
longDescription:
Our Medieval Fantasy Armor SFX pack offers a wide range of possibilities, much like its weapon counterpart. The sounds are designed to seamlessly fit both Pick-Up and Equip actions, as they share similar characteristics. However, feel free to explore and adapt them to best suit your game's needs. The pack covers four main materials: plate, cloth, leather, and chainmail. Plate armor dominates the collection, reflecting its prevalence in medieval armory. Additionally, we provide sounds for shields and various other inventory actions, enhancing the immersive experience of your game.
